Tabou's 10 statue raising method, 2HD, 2LD, No Life Loss, Tablet Neutral
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Raising/Training Methods: Methods That Don't Work: Tabou's 10 statue raising method, 2HD, 2LD, No Life Loss, Tablet Neutral
By TabouDelazy on Friday, December 7, 2001 - 01:41 pm:

Beware, this method as written causes lifespan loss.
The reason it (probably) fails, is that he assumes the effect of the mint leaf is giving 50+% stress reduction (I.e 17/2=8 stress after Mint Leaf) Instead of 50-% stress reduction (17/2=9 stress after ML). (by Brimstone, who did more statue research.


I took information from other threads at this board and I threw this together. It allows you to every month give the monster the same items and do the same difficulty of drill with no life loss. Two HD, and two LD. This can be done with any monster that either neutral to tablets or likes tablets. For my example, I will use liking tablets. The only 'tricks' to this is to not introduce more stress by cheat, failure, or not praising greats. Also, you must have 10 statues in your inventory to burn off excess fatigue.

Key:
----
Tab - Tablet, -13 stress
ML - Mint Leaf, 1/2 stress
NO - Nut Oils, -28 fatigue
LD - Light Drill, +10 fatigue, +5 stress
HD - Heavy Drill, +15 fatigue, +12 stress
LI - Life index, fatigue+2*stress, must be under 70

Here is a 24 week period as it would run with 10 statues and starting with 0/0 fatigue/stress. The line should be read from left to right. So after a food, statues, item, and actions are performed the fatigue/stress is calculated.

Week:Food:Item:Action:Fatigue:Stress:LI
1 :Tab :ML :HD : 15 : 12 : 39
2 :n/a :ML :LD : 25 : 11 : 47
3 :n/a :ML :LD : 35 : 10 : 55
4 :n/a :NO :HD : 20 : 22 : 64

5 :Tab :ML :HD : 35 : 16 : 67
6 :n/a :ML :LD : 43 : 13 : 69
7 :n/a :ML :LD : 43 : 11 : 65
8 :n/a :NO :HD : 20 : 23 : 66

9 :Tab :ML :HD : 35 : 17 : 69
10 :n/a :ML :LD : 43 : 13 : 69
11 :n/a :ML :LD : 43 : 11 : 65
12 :n/a :NO :HD : 20 : 23 : 66

13 :Tab :ML :HD : 35 : 17 : 69
14 :n/a :ML :LD : 43 : 13 : 69
15 :n/a :ML :LD : 43 : 11 : 65
16 :n/a :NO :HD : 20 : 23 : 66

17 :Tab :ML :HD : 35 : 17 : 69
18 :n/a :ML :LD : 43 : 13 : 69
19 :n/a :ML :LD : 43 : 11 : 65
20 :n/a :NO :HD : 20 : 23 : 66

21 :Tab :ML :HD : 35 : 17 : 69
22 :n/a :ML :LD : 43 : 13 : 69
23 :n/a :ML :LD : 43 : 11 : 65
24 :n/a :no :HD : 20 : 23 : 66

Lets analyze week 13 through 16 since the number are repeating by then already to see how I figured this.

Week 13 starts with 20/23 stress/fatigue. Taking a tablet will reduce this to 20/10. Having 10 statues will have no effect and leave 20/10. The Mint Left will make 20/5 and a hard drill will give us 35/17. LI is checked and we are at 69.

Week 14 starts with 35/17. 10 statues makes it 33/17 by burning off 2 fatigue. Mint Leaf makes it 35/8. Light Drill gives us 43/13. LI is checked and we are at 69.

Week 15 starts with 43/13. 10 statues makes it 33/17 by burning off 10 fatigue. Mint Leaf makes it 33/6. Light Drill gives us 43/11. LI is checked and we are at 65.

Week 16 starts with 43/11. 10 statues makes it 33/11 by burning off 10 fatigue. Nut Oil makes it 5/11. Heavy Drill gives us 20/23. LI is checked and we are at 66.

Week 17 starts with 20/23 again the cycle is started again.
